description:
Fuyuki`s having dinner with Momoka`s father, and he notices the man has an extremely long nose hair.  He doesn`t know how to mention it without making the man angry!  And then they all go to Hisquesviel Planet, and Natsumi loses the top of her swimsuit.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Fuyuki Worried! / Natsumi, the Ocean Isn`t Large or Big
冬樹 気になる! であります / 夏美 海は広いな大きいな であります
